tagline: Know Your User Before You Build
description: Your project serves developers and AI enthusiasts who crave powerful, portable tooling. Use the Empathy Map builder to deeply understand their frustrations with existing AI assistants—fragmented tools, vendor lock-in, and lack of privacy. Your single-project model and ECA integration already show user-centric thinking; now articulate exactly who you're liberating from the complexity of current AI frameworks.

tagline: The Only AI Assistant That Grows With You
description: Ouroboros Chat's unique value lies in being both a powerful chat platform aggregator AND a structured product development workspace. Your 5-phase Web UX Platform with learning flywheel isn't just a feature—it's a differentiated approach where every conversation generates wisdom. Emphasize that users don't just get answers; they build products while learning how to build better ones.

tagline: Ship the Core, Keep the Snake
description: Your 29 cards across 4 builders (Empathy 6, Value Prop 6, MVP 8, Lean Canvas 9) show substantial progress—prioritize the minimum path through the flywheel that proves the value loop. Launch with: (1) one chat platform (Telegram is simplest), (2) empathy map builder, (3) ECA-powered wisdom sidebar. Everything else (Slack/Discord, full canvas, collaboration) is polish, not prerequisites for validation.

The Lean Canvas should crystallize: Problem (fragmented AI tooling), Solution (unified platform + structured building), Unfair Advantage (Clojure ecosystem + learning memory). Your architecture already proves technical viability; now validate market fit by asking: which persona (solo developer, small team, enterprise AI team) will pay for persistence, collaboration, and cross-project analysis? The canvas makes this explicit and testable.
